<denchmark-h:h2>OpenCV was crashed on Samsung Tab 4 SM-T1331</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>OpenCV was crashes when I opened the software and I could not do something else. This is the Error Message: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Native method not found: org.opencv.highgui.VideoCapture.n_VideoCapture:(I) </denchmark-code>
